name: diff-lens
description: AI-powered git diff code review using AWS Bedrock or VS Code Language Models

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to DiffLens!

Configure your AI provider settings to start automated code reviews.

[Open Settings](command:diff-lens.openSettings)

Supported AI providers:
• AWS Bedrock
• VS Code Language Model API

Make sure you have a git repository in your workspace.

diffLens.systemPrompt.default: You are a senior software engineer conducting a code review. Please analyze the provided git diff and provide constructive feedback focusing on code quality, security, performance, and best practices.
diffLens.systemPrompt.description: System prompt to be sent to the AI model

diffLens.reviewPerspective.default: Focus on code quality, security vulnerabilities, performance issues, and adherence to best practices. Provide specific suggestions for improvement.

diffLens.contextLines.description: Number of context lines to show before and after changes in git diff (equivalent to git diff -U option)

diffLens.excludeDeletes.description: Exclude deleted files and lines from git diff output (show only added and modified files)

diffLens.fileExtensions.description: File extensions to include in diff output (e.g., '*.js *.ts *.py'). Leave empty to include all files. Uses git pathspec format.

diffLens.llmProvider.description: LLM provider to use for code review

diffLens.awsAccessKey.description: AWS Access Key ID for Bedrock access (required when using AWS Bedrock)

diffLens.awsSecretKey.description: AWS Secret Access Key for Bedrock access (required when using AWS Bedrock)

diffLens.awsRegion.description: AWS region for Bedrock service (used when provider is AWS Bedrock)

diffLens.modelName.description: Bedrock model name to use for code review (used when provider is AWS Bedrock)

diffLens.vscodeLmVendor.description: VS Code LM vendor (e.g., 'copilot') - used when provider is vscode-lm

diffLens.vscodeLmFamily.description: VS Code LM model family (e.g., 'gpt-4o', 'gpt-3.5-turbo') - used when provider is vscode-lm

diffLens.favoritePrompts.description: 保存されたお気に入りプロンプト設定

diffLens.maxFavoritePrompts.description: 保存可能なお気に入りプロンプトの最大数

diffLens.promptAutoSave.description: プロンプト変更時の自動保存機能

diffLens.maxFileSize.description: 最大ファイルサイズ（バイト単位、0で制限なし）

diffLens.fileSizeUnit.description: ファイルサイズ設定の単位

diffLens.showExcludedFiles.description: 除外されたファイルの通知表示

diffLens.excludedFileLimit.description: 除外ファイル一覧の表示上限

diffLens.excludeBinaryFiles.description: バイナリファイルを自動的に除外

diffLens.binaryFileExtensions.description: バイナリファイルとして扱う拡張子（カンマ区切り）

diffLens.textFileExtensions.description: 明示的にテキストファイルとして扱う拡張子

enumDescriptions: ファイル内容のみで判定
拡張子と内容の両方で判定
diffLens.binaryDetectionMethod.description: バイナリファイルの判定方法

diffLens.binaryContentThreshold.description: バイナリ判定のための非ASCII文字の割合閾値

diffLens.defaultExportFormat.description: デフォルトのエクスポート形式

diffLens.exportDirectory.description: エクスポートファイルの保存ディレクトリ

diffLens.exportFilenamePattern.description: エクスポートファイル名のパターン

diffLens.exportTemplate.description: エクスポートテンプレート

diffLens.includeGitInfo.description: エクスポートにGit情報を含める

diffLens.includeStatistics.description: エクスポートに統計情報を含める

diffLens.exportHistory.description: エクスポート履歴（最新20件）

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
